In *[NetHack](/wiki/NetHack "NetHack")*, the letter **H** serves the following purposes:

- h represents a [humanoid](/wiki/Humanoid_\(monster_class\) "Humanoid (monster class)"):

  - h [hobbit](/wiki/Hobbit "Hobbit")
  - h [dwarf](/wiki/Dwarf_\(monster\) "Dwarf (monster)")
  - h [bugbear](/wiki/Bugbear "Bugbear")
  - h [dwarf lord](/wiki/Dwarf_lord "Dwarf lord")
  - h [dwarf king](/wiki/Dwarf_king "Dwarf king")
  - h [mind flayer](/wiki/Mind_flayer "Mind flayer")
  - h [master mind flayer](/wiki/Master_mind_flayer "Master mind flayer")

* H represents a [giant humanoid](/wiki/Giant_humanoid "Giant humanoid"):

  - H [giant](/wiki/Giant "Giant")
  - H [stone giant](/wiki/Stone_giant "Stone giant")
  - H [hill giant](/wiki/Hill_giant "Hill giant")
  - H [fire giant](/wiki/Fire_giant "Fire giant")
  - H [frost giant](/wiki/Frost_giant "Frost giant")
  - H [storm giant](/wiki/Storm_giant "Storm giant")
  - H [ettin](/wiki/Ettin "Ettin")
  - H [titan](/wiki/Titan "Titan")
  - H [minotaur](/wiki/Minotaur "Minotaur")
  - H [Cyclops](/wiki/Cyclops "Cyclops")

- It is also used as a [direction](/wiki/Direction "Direction") key if [numpad](/wiki/Numpad "Numpad") movement is off:

  - Press [h]() to move west.
  - Press [shift](/wiki/Shift "Shift") + [h]() to move far west.

* If numpad movement is on:
  - Pressing [h]() opens the help menu.

## Variants

### SLASH'EM

[SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM") introduces new monsters that use the h and H glyphs:

- h humanoid:

  - h [dwarf thief](/wiki/Dwarf_thief "Dwarf thief")
  - h [duergar](/wiki/Duergar "Duergar")
  - h [deep one](/wiki/Deep_one "Deep one")
  - h [deeper one](/wiki/Deeper_one "Deeper one")
  - h [deepest one](/wiki/Deepest_one "Deepest one")

- H giant humanoid:
  - H [The Largest Giant](/wiki/The_Largest_Giant "The Largest Giant")

### UnNetHack

[UnNetHack](/wiki/UnNetHack "UnNetHack") introduces one new creature that use the h glyph:

- h humanoid:
  - h [Cthulhu](/wiki/Cthulhu "Cthulhu")

[![This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.7. Click here for more information.](/images/f/f7/Nh367-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.7. Click here for more information.")

H

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
Printable ASCII characters
~ ! @ # $ % ^ & * ( ) _ + space
` 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 0 - = { } |
Qq Ww Ee Rr Tt Yy Uu Ii Oo Pp : " [ ] \
Aa Ss Dd Ff Gg Hh Jj Kk Ll ? ; ' Ctrl
Zz Xx Cc Vv Bb Nn Mm , . / < > Alt

In NetHack, the letter H serves the following purposes:

  • h represents a humanoid:
    • h hobbit
    • h dwarf
    • h bugbear
    • h dwarf lord
    • h dwarf king
    • h mind flayer
    • h master mind flayer
  • H represents a giant humanoid:
    • H giant
    • H stone giant
    • H hill giant
    • H fire giant
    • H frost giant
    • H storm giant
    • H ettin
    • H titan
    • H minotaur
    • H Cyclops
  • It is also used as a direction key if numpad movement is off:
    • Press h to move west.
    • Press shift + h to move far west.
  • If numpad movement is on:
    • Pressing h opens the help menu.

Variants

SLASH'EM

SLASH'EM introduces new monsters that use the h and H glyphs:

  • h humanoid:
    • h dwarf thief
    • h duergar
    • h deep one
    • h deeper one
    • h deepest one
  • H giant humanoid:
    • H The Largest Giant

UnNetHack

UnNetHack introduces one new creature that use the h glyph:

  • h humanoid:
    • h Cthulhu
